data.title: Tee Time on the Plaza - Brookfield Place New York
data.meta_description: Putt putt your way through this 8-hole mini golf course. Grab a friend & make a day of it at Brookfield Place!
data.text:
Putt putt your way through this 7-hole mini golf course. Grab a friend & make a day of it at Brookfield Place! Suitable for ages 5 and up.

Registration is now open for Thursday, May 27.

Reserve your tickets as early as 4 PM the day before the event.

Walk-ons are also welcome!

*Each reservation will accommodate a group of up to 4 people; there is no need to make individual reservations.

Course Rules

No more than four players per group

Please move as a group from one green to the next, and do not start on any hole until the group ahead finishes

Five stroke limit per hole

One stroke penalty if ball leaves fairway

Ball may be moved 6 inches from rail with no penalty

Ball hit by another is replaced where it was hit

Do not swing putter above your knees

Health & Safety

Face coverings are required for attendees and should cover your nose and mouth at all times throughout the experience. Guests who remove their face coverings will be asked to leave immediately.

We request that you maintain a minimum of 6-foot distance between yourself and others not in your party at all times.

All participants must read and sign our waiver in order to play.

All events and activations at BFPL adhere to New York state regulations to ensure safety of the public and staff.

Click here to learn more about activities on the Waterfront!
